config_definition.entry: Toggle to turn on ad_spinup
CLM BGC mode
Toggle to turn on C13 isotopes as part of the CN biogeochemistry model
Toggle to turn on passing of carbon aerosols to land in ccsm_seq mode
User specified C compiler overrides Makefile default (linux only).
Toggle to build using CCSM makefiles or not.
User specified C compiler options to append to Makefile defaults.
CLM build directory; contains .o and .mod files.
Name of CLM executable.
Directory where CLM executable will be created.
Root directory of CLM source distribution.
Component framework interface to use (MCT or ESMF)
User specified CPP defines to append to Makefile defaults.
Switch to enable debugging options for Fortran compiler: 0=off, 1=on.
Toggle to turn on dust module
Directory containing ESMF library (for linking to external ESMF).
Toggle to turn exit spinup
User specified Fortran compiler overrides Makefile default.
User specified Fortran compiler flags to append to Makefile defaults.
User specified Fortran optimization flags to override Makefile defaults.
Directory containing LAPACK library.
User specified load options to append to Makefile defaults.
User specified linker. Overrides the Makefile default $(FC).
CCSM build machine name and compiler
Maximum number of pfts per gridcell (numpft+1 means use all available)
CLM coupling mode
Directory containing MPI include files.
Directory containing MPI library.
Name of MPI library.
Directory containing NetCDF include files.
Directory containing NetCDF library.
Directory containing NetCDF module files.
Toggle to make wildfires inactive for biogeochemistry=CN mode
Toggle to turn on perturbation error growth test
Toggle to enable/disable building with the PIO parallel I/O library (by default not used, use BUILDPIO CPP token to turn on use of it)
Toggle to turn on prognostic sea salt
Toggle to turn on river runoff module
Switch to enable or disable building SMP version (OPENMP) of CLM: 0=off, 1=on.
Toggle to turn on calculation of SNICAR radiative forcing
Switch to enable or disable building SPMD version of CLM: 0=off, 1=on.
Toggle to turn on CN supplemental nitrogen
OS for which CLM is being built. The value is the name returned by the "uname -s" command on the target platform. This parameter is to allow cross-compilation.
User source directories to prepend to the filepath. Multiple directories are specified as a comma separated list with no embedded white space.
Toggle to turn on voc module
